entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 03:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
